actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the dollar limit on the amount of compensation which may be deferred under State and local deferred compensation plans.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase from $7,500 to $15,000 the amount of compensation which may be deferred under State and local deferred compensation plans.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the dollar limit on the amount of compensation which may be deferred under State and local deferred compensation plans.
